articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Aditya Roy Kapur, Ananya Panday return from European vacation. Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Aditya Roy Kapur and Ananya Panday were spotted in grey casuals as they returned from Europe after pictures of them together went viral.
articles.content: Aditya Roy Kapur and Ananya Panday returned home from their Spain and Portugal vacation together. However, they chose to walk out solo upon their exit from the Mumbai airport but were spotted by the … [+2081 chars]
